response.answer_text: “Exploring Biology for medical entrance exams by Arihant Publication” is really a good book for NEET preparation. It has 2 volumes. Some important features of the book are: Chapters are exactly as per the NCERT syllabus.Ample diagrams that helps in better understanding.The exercise part has…. Self practice questions, Medical entrance gallery ( last 12 years entrance questions chapterwise). Explanation for all the questions of medical entrance gallery has been given.Some new pattern entrance questions like, (more than one option correct, matching the column, Assertion and reason.) are also included.The book has arond 300 Mcqs for each chapter. For some chapters its even more than 500. It really helps. Other than that, there is a book named Rapid biology by MTG publication . It does not have any questions or Mcqs. All the chapters are covered, and the text is given pointwise. One can easily form questions on their own. This book is recommended for preparation in those final days before the exam where you have to just skim through the chapters and have a look at the key points. Hope this helps. Best of luck for NEET.
